S.FORM: Bhutan Gaga kska Yacow ka Bhutan, 27 30 N, 90 30 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 38,394 sq km (hangan na o Tg137) (knlbanga dxgal o 38,394 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 0 sq km). Kana ka sejiqun o niqan 750,125 hiyi. Gaga Thimphu ka pusu alang paru, jiyax 17 idas 12 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Manu ka dxgal Bhutan ga wada sugan 13.60 ka dxgal qpahan, 85.50 ka dxgal bbuyu, rahuq dxgal do niqan 0.90 na. Bukung klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Jigme Khesar Namgyel Wangchuck, pnaah hngkawas2006 idas 12 jiyax 14pnrajing kmlawa klwaan.
